other_tests.findings: Produced a 9-mm wheal and a 30-mm flare at 15 min in response to latex.
Tryptase concentration was 26.4 µg/l (normal value <12 µg/l), and histamine concentration was 68.2 nM (normal value <9 nM).
Latex-specific immunoglobulin E was 2.39 kU/l (normal value <0.35 kU/l).
Degranulation was 16% for latex and 17% for avocado.
Severe right ventricular dysfunction with RV-fractional area change increased from 18% pre-CPB to 38% post-CPB.

other_tests.procedure_name: Pulmonary artery pressure and systemic pressure measurement after inhaled iloprost
other_tests.findings: Pulmonary artery pressure and PVR decreased significantly after administration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: PVR/SVR ratio was increased after CPB compared to preoperative values.
